attributes.action: Increase the speed limit on motorways to 80 mph
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: With the onslaught of static and mobile speed control cameras operated by the local authority or police sensible drivers are continually penalised to the point of persecution and are regarded by local government as an easy source of revenue.

rejection.details: Very similar to http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/85-mph/ you may wish to consider signing that petition
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
